mapper.select: select IFNULL(active_w001.accountNumber, #{accountNumber}) as accountNumber, IFNULL(active_w001.dataNumber, #{dataNumber}) as dataNumber, count(*) as count, IFNULL(sum(money), 0) as sum, IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CAST(AVG(money) AS CHAR), '.', 1), 0) as avg from (select * from interviewworks.w001 where accountNumber = #{accountNumber} and type = #{type}) as active_w001
